"Ronaldine's Tasks":
"Completing one of Ronaldine's \"Loop Tasks\" will automatically assign you the next one in sequence.

If you complete the final Task in the loop, you will return to the beginning. If you abandon a Task in the middle of the loop, you will have to start the loop from the beginning."

"Some Loop Tasks have rewards that you can only earn the first time you complete them.

These rewards are labelled as \"First Clear Rewards\"."
"Ronaldine is touring the ARKS bases in each region, such as Central City in Aelio."
